sys_element_mapping.value:
You now have a walk scheduled at Trigger➛...➛Time with Trigger➛...➛Dog.

 

${URI}

Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name requested a walk on Trigger➛...➛Time for Trigger➛...➛Dog.

${URI}

Hey Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 Trigger➛...➛Name just finished a walk with Trigger➛...➛Dog. They were out for Trigger➛...➛Walk Duration hours. We are sure that Trigger➛...➛Dog enjoyed it! Make sure to schedule your next walk.

 

${URI} 

-Walking Robyn

sys_element_mapping.value:
Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name requested a walk on Trigger➛...➛Time for Trigger➛...➛Dog.

${URI}

You now have a walk scheduled at Trigger➛...➛Time with Trigger➛...➛Dog.

 

${URI}

Hey Trigger - Record Created➛...➛Name,

 Trigger➛...➛Name just finished a walk with Trigger➛...➛Dog. They were out for Trigger➛...➛Walk Duration hours. We are sure that Trigger➛...➛Dog enjoyed it! Make sure to schedule your next walk.

 

${URI} 

-Walking Robyn
